item.title: Create Access Grant in CLI
item.description: Create Access Grant in CLI # You need to have a satellite account and installed Uplink CLI. To start, proceed through the initial steps of creating a new Access Grant. Navigate to Access page and click the Create Keys for CLI link (rightmost option). 4. Provide name, permissions and optionally buckets, select Create Keys. 5. Copy and save the Satellite Address and API Key in a safe place or download them as they will only appear once.
